title: Episode 94: Race and Racism in the College Classroom by Cyndi Kernahan (Professor Book Club)
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: A group of professors from the University of Wisconsin Green Bay joins our hosts for a book club inspired episode to discuss the book by Cindi Kernahan, Race and Racism in the College Classroom. Additionally, Cindi herself joins us to answer questions about the book and her experience at large.
itunes:subtitle: A group of professors from the University of Wiscâ€¦
